description: This table contains the Patient Positioning Left Leg Devices information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LEFT_LEG_DEV_C_NAME
columns.description:
The left leg devices used.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
